title: Episode 241: Race!  Religion!  Trump!  w/Theon Hill
description: Why do black and white evangelicals see the world so differently?  Race and religion in the age of Trump, with professor Theon Hill.
content:encoded: Why do black and white evangelicals see the world so differently?  Race and religion in the age of Trump, with professor Theon Hill.
